answers.author: Zeke Hanzl
answers.text:
Hi Linda, 
My company company (HRSentry) provides a licensable program which helps mitigate specifically against EPL related risk.  It's being successfully used by many communities, risk pools, leagues of cities and towns, school systems etc.  Let me know if you'd like more information.  Zeke Hanzl, zeke@hrsentry.com

author: Linda Pearce
text:
Good morning, I am in the process of searching for new Risk Management software to manage our City claims, we are currently using STARS. What types of software are being used by other localities?
Thanks for your help
Linda Pearce
lpearce@nngov.com
title: Risk Management Software
